column2: UPDATE 3-Rocket Internet's sales growth slows as seeks to stem lossesRocket Internet's sales growth slows as seeks to stem losses BERLIN Shares in German ecommerce investor Rocket Internet  slid on Tuesday after it reported that revenue growth slowed sharply in the first quarter at most of its top start-ups as it took steps to try to reduce their losses.  Rocket Internet's sales growth slows as seeks to stem losses BERLIN Shares in German ecommerce investor Rocket Internet  slid on Tuesday after it reported that revenue growth slowed sharply in the first quarter at most of its top start-ups as it took steps to try to reduce their losses. * Shares down 5 pct   (Adds comments from call
column3: investor
column4: analyst)Rocket Internet's sales growth slows as seeks to stem losses BERLIN Shares in German ecommerce investor Rocket Internet  slid on Tuesday after it reported that revenue growth slowed sharply in the first quarter at most of its top start-ups as it took steps to try to reduce their losses.
